description: A nice hike circumnavigating Matheson Lake with a few places to view the lake. From the parking lot follow the trail along the south side of the lake until it comes to the Galloping Goose. Turn Right along the Goose and then right again on the footpath back to the parking lot.
directions: From Victoria follow the Old Island Highway, which turns into Sooke Road. From Sooke Road, turn left on Happy Valley Road, then right on Rocky Point Road, and right again on Matheson Lake Park Road
title: Matheson Lake Loop Trail
